name: Shoal of fish (itch)
description:
Survival game in which you play as a fish, but you are not alone, because you live with others fishes, being part of a shoal of fish. You will have to avoid enemies and eat food to survive in the ocean as much as you can.

The dangers of the ocean are waiting you, will you survive?

Controls:

- Move pointing with the mouse

- Left click to dash

This game was made for the Brackeys Jam 2022.2 during 7 days. The theme was: You are not alone.
